title: Tabbouleh with cannellini beans
ingredients: ['180g bulgur wheat, uncooked', '350ml boiling water', '100g fresh parsley, chopped', '30g baby spinach, chopped', '1 tomato, diced', '1/2 yellow pepper, diced', '1 small onion, finely diced', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1 (410g) tin cannellini beans, drained and rinsed', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '1 lemon, juiced', '1 1/2 teaspoons sea salt', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste']
